quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Project Runway and Cold Case
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, couture, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what American city is the TV show Cold Case set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Philadelphia

questions.question: The animated series “He-Man and the Masters of the Universe” was the precursor to the briefly successful series Blackstar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who went home first in Season 3 of Project Runway?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who won the Mom challenge in Project Runway, Season 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vincent

questions.question: What is the translation of Haute Couture?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: High Dressmaking

questions.question: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe was the very first animated series to be produced directly for syndication.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is name of the lead detective on the show Cold Case?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lilly Rush

questions.question: On the TV show Cold Case, Lilly and her father are very close and talk everyday.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who was accused of cheating during the finale of Project Runway, Season 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeffrey

questions.question: In what year did the 1980s series He-Man and the Masters of the Universe end?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1985

questions.question: Who won Project Runway, Season 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeffrey

questions.question: In what year did the animated series He-Man and the Masters of the Universe debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1983

questions.question: What year did the series Cold Case first air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2003

options.text: He brought them back to life.

questions.question: What unfriendly name did The Initiative give to demons in the Buffy series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hostiles

questions.question: How long was Pam engaged to Roy on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3 years

questions.question: Which old enemy of Buffys stole her body, and gave Buffy their fugitive body in return?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Faith

questions.question: Buffys ex-boyfriend Angel came to Sunnydale at least once in season 4 of the series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Office and Pam
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, tv, belongs. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: With which member of the Party Planning Committee does Office character Pam often come into conflict?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angela

questions.question: Which statement is true about Office character Pam?

options.text: Pam can type 90 words per minute.
Pams favorite flavor of yogurt is Cherry Vanilla.
Pam graduated from college with a degree in art.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pam can type 90 words per minute.

questions.question: On the sitcom The Office, what does Roy do when Pam admits she kissed Jim?

options.text: He becomes depressed and gains 100 pounds.
He quits Dunder Mifflin and goes to work for Staples.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He attempts to attack Jim.

questions.question: Office character Pam once dated  Michael Scott.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: On The Office, who does Jim date first?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The pocket book saleswoman

questions.question: Office character Pam needs neither glasses nor contact lenses.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What type of car does Pam drive on the TV show The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toyota Yaris hatchback

questions.question: Where did Roy take Pam on their first date on the sitcom The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A minor league hockey game

questions.question: In 2007 the actress who plays Pam on The Office co-starred with John C. Reilly, Tim Meadows, and Frankie Muniz in this movie about the life of a musician who has three wives and 22 children.

options.text: Walking Hard: The Dewey Cox Story

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walking Hard: The Dewey Cox Story

questions.question: What is the relation between Office character Pam and  the series Gilmore Girls?

options.text: The actress who plays Pam was the sister-in-law to the actor who portrays Kirk.
The actress who plays Pam auditioned for the role of Miss Patty.
The actress who plays Pam was in two episodes of Gilmore Girls.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The actress who plays Pam was the sister-in-law to the actor who portrays Kirk.

questions.question: Which actress portrays Pam on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jenna Fischer

questions.question: From which restaurant chain is Pam barred on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chilis

questions.question: On the sitcom The Office, Pam belongs to a very exclusive club. What is its name?

options.text: The Daughters of the American Revolution

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Finer Things Club

questions.question: The actress who plays Pam on The Office received an Emmy Award after season 3.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which member of the Office staff often calls Pam hot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kevin

Quit and went to work at Staples

questions.question: The Office character Jim Halpert pulled  this prank on Dwight when Dwight was to give a speech as the top paper salesman.

options.text: He convinced Dwight to make a Mussolini-type speech.
He convinced Dwight  to give the speech in American Sigh Language.

John Krasinski was born October 20, 1979 in Philadelphia, Pa.
John Krasinski was born October 20, 1979 in Boston, Ma.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Krasinski was born October 20, 1979 in Boston, Ma.
